323620.name: eden - 3D Screensaver
323620.description:
eden is a 3D Screensaver with beautiful graphics. Discover handbuilt environments: From snow-covered mountains to a day at a sunny beach.

Please note: eden is under active development, frequently receiving updates to content and functionality free of charge! In other words: It is currently nowhere near finished, things are likely to change and everything might be a bit rough around the edges. If 'Early Access' isn't your thing at all, please consider not buying this software.

Current features

  • Lovely handmade/detailed 3D environments

  • Music and sounds matches every level (i.e stormy wind on the mountains, light breeze on the meadow)

Planned future Features

  • Workshop Integration - make your own environments and share them with the entire community

This is subject to change.
